cause.description:
Our dear friend Priya Vij is in trouble. She has TB
Uh oh.
If you don't know what TB is, Wikipedia it.
YAY!
1. Priya needs to feel like she has friends...join our cause!
2. Priya really doesn't have friends.
3. Yes I am a mean mean MEAN person...haha ilu vij!
cause.mission: Help raise money to cure priya, so she won't die.
cause.name: Priya Has TB...uh oh =(
